metadata.title: CVE-2024-2818 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions before16.8.5, all versions starting from 16.9 before 16.9.3, all versionsstarting from 16.10 before 16.10.1. It was possible for an attacker tocause a denial of service using malicious crafted description parameter forlabels.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
